As much as 98% of human error is due to problems with Situational Awareness.
Situational Awareness is the ability to maintain awareness of what is happening on the:

quiz.q: A Pre-tip Inspection is required to ensure that the equipment is serviceable and that all of the controls work properly.
Human Error is defined as inadvertently doing what should have been done.
